casebody.data:
CRAIG
v.
MITCHELL. No. 440P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 2, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Mitchell.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of August 2004 by Plaintiff to Bypass the N.C. Court of Appeals:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of December 2004."
